## {.sidebar}

```{python}
import pandas as pd
import plotly.express as px
from inspect_viz import (
    reactive_df, select, param, menu_input, figure_view, table_view
)

# parameters
petal_width = param(2)
petal_length = param(4)

# data source
df = reactive_df(px.data.iris()).query(
    select("*")
    .where(f"petal_width < {petal_width}")
    .where(f"petal_length < {petal_length}")
)
```


```{python}
menu_input(df, column="species")
```

## Column 

```{python}
fig = px.scatter(df, x="sepal_width", y="sepal_length")
figure_view(df, fig)
```

```{python}
table_view(df)
```
